Message:
Phew! Playing together
with Tama and Nina today
sure was fun!

“What’re you
talking about, partner?
It’s your birthday,
so we’ve gotta make sure
today’s reeeal flashy!”

So, it’s Artie’s birthday today.
That must be why
she looks so happy.

That reminds me...
When I was little,
I’m pretty sure Big Sis
made me candies
for my birthday once.

It made me so happy,
I asked her for more.

So, she promised that
she’d make some
for me every year.

Ever since then,
I’d look forward to my birthday
even more than before.

It was so exciting—hearing the
sounds of the pot bubbling,
smelling the sweet scent
of melted sugar, and seeing
Big Sis put on her serious face...

Seeing her put all that effort in,
just for me,
always made me so happy...
I really loved it...

But, after we were
abandoned on that mountain,
she never made those candies
for me again.

Sometimes I wonder...
did she forget her promise?

Will I never be able to have
Big Sis’s handmade candies
ever again...?

As it got closer to my birthday,
a sweet smell just like this one
would fill the house...
